channel.title: PvP/Wildy Areas
channel.description:
I want to know how to make a PVP area?
E.g; You step how of edgville bank and you in a pvp zone.
I've searched, all I could find is a FunPk tutorial which I don't want because I want proper pk and this [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,429738.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,429738.0.html[/url]
I tried searching [code]public boolean isInPitRoom[/code] but it isn't in Client.java .

item.title: PvP/Wildy Areas
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

usually you would go into your server file go into client.java and search public boolean nonWild() {
something like this should come up if not look for it through client.java
public boolean nonWild() {
if ((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <= 3431)
|| (absX >= 2562 && absX <= 2625 && absY >= 9403 && absY <= 9473)
|| (absX >= 2874 && absX <= 3339 && absY >= 2878 && absY <= 3341)
|| (absX >= 2575 && absX <= 2635 && absY >= 3387 && absY <= 3428)

just a little explaining here
|| (absX >= (most southwest X coord) && absX <= (most northeast X coord) && absY >= (most southwest Y coord) && absY <= (most northeast Y coord)
the first set of numbers is the most southwest part of what u want to be safe coordinates X
the third set of numbers (absY >= ****) is the second part to this
the second set of numbers is the most north-east part of what u want to be safe coordinates X
the fourth set of numbers is the

lets say your in edgeville and you want the whole city to be safe turn your map with the north pointer towards the wild now walk to the far south-west corner and do ::mypos and write down that coord
now go to the most north east corner and write down the coords its pretty easy if u need anymore help contact me

Read full topic
